Hi, I'm Árnilsen Arthur

Creating multiplayer worlds since age 13

I'm a passionate game developer and technical artist with over 10 years of experience, starting my journey at age 13 through Minecraft modding and evolving into a specialist in multiplayer game development and network architecture. My path has taken me from self-taught Java programming to working at leading game studios, continuously pushing the boundaries of interactive entertainment.

Currently working as a Tech Artist & Software Engineer at Triplo Studios, I previously worked on multiplayer game development at Fried Chicken Labs (Snackclub ecosystem) using Photon's Quantum Engine. During this time, I developed expertise in high-performance networking and contributed to games serving thousands of concurrent players.

I've created NetBuff, a custom high-performance networking library for Unity that reduced network latency by 40% and simplified multiplayer implementation for commercial games. My portfolio showcases diverse projects including award-winning cooperative games like Solis (Best Game Design winner), competitive multiplayer shooters, and innovative technical achievements like a 3D chess engine with full Stockfish AI integration.

I excel in Unity 3D, C#, multiplayer networking, and performance optimization, with extensive experience in LWJGL graphics programming, Java modding, and cross-platform development. I combine technical expertise with creative vision to deliver engaging, scalable player experiences that perform flawlessly across different platforms and network conditions.

Game Development Projects

NetBuff

High-Performance Unity Networking Library

C# Unity Networking

A lightweight, high-performance networking library for Unity that simplifies multiplayer game development. Built from the ground up to provide better performance and easier implementation than existing solutions.

Features include automatic synchronization, latency compensation, and a clean API that integrates seamlessly with Unity's component system. Used in production games serving thousands of concurrent players.

Key Achievements:

  • Reduced network latency by 40%
  • Simplified multiplayer implementation
  • Production-ready for commercial games

Visual Effects Portifolio

College-time (2022) VFX showcase

Unity C# Tech Art

Lighting System

Advanced lighting system for Unity

Unity C# Tech Art

Implementation of a URP Lighting System that handles thousands of lights with a low impact on performance.

Key Achievements:

  • 9000+ lights handled with a low impact on performance
  • Realist volumetric lighting support
  • Baked and real-time shadows support

Takedown Legends

Multplayer arena-like shooter

Unity C# Multiplayer Tech Art Quantum Engine

Takedown Legends is a multiplayer arena-like shooter where you can choose from a variety of characters and fight in a 3v3 arena. It was created with the Photon's Quantum Engine and is a tech-art project.

Solis

Cooperative Puzzle Platformer

Unity C# Networking Tech Art

A beautifully crafted cooperative puzzle platformer where two players control siblings on a journey through a post-apocalyptic world. The game emphasizes communication, trust, and creative problem-solving.

Features unique mechanics where players must coordinate actions, share abilities, and solve environmental puzzles together. The art style combines hand-drawn aesthetics with dynamic lighting effects.

Key Achievements:

  • Won 'Best Game Design' in college showcase
  • Featured in local game development community
  • Developed in 6 months by 3-person team

Sketch Fleets

Multiplatform Space Shooter

Unity C# Multiplatform

Created with 5 friends as a college project, Sketch Fleets is a starship shooter, where you can summon allies using the drop of dead enemies, forming a fleet. The game has an artistic style based on sketches, hence the name of the game.

Key Achievements:

  • 5-person team collaboration
  • Implemented multiplayer mechanics
  • Unique sketch-based art style

Between Death

Dark Gothic RPG

Unity C# RPG

In Between Death, immerse yourself in a dark and gothic RPG that pushes the boundaries of the supernatural. Dive into a universe where the line between life and death blurs, and uncover a world steeped in mystery and darkness.

Key Achievements:

  • Explored dark fantasy genre
  • Implemented RPG mechanics
  • Atmospheric world-building

Amica Run

Multiplayer Mobile Runner

Unity C# Mobile Networking

Amica Run is a mobile runner made with my friend Júlia Moraes for a college project. It was the first game that I applied my networking skills to create a multiplayer game in just six months.

Key Achievements:

  • First multiplayer game implementation
  • 6-month development timeline
  • Cross-platform mobile deployment

Terminal Lost

Paper's Please based game

Unity C# Tech Art Game Jam

Terminal Lost is a Paper's Please based game where you have to manage a terminal and fix the problems that appear. It was created with my friend Júlia Moraes for a college project.

Árnilsen's Minecraft In-Game Timer

Java Minecraft

As the name implies, In-Game Timer is a timer for speedruns with layout customization,screen recognition and auto-updated splits (For now only works 1.12+). Created by Árnilsen Arthur/Infobros2000 with Java using java-json api

Factory Engine Mod

Java Minecraft

Factory Engine is a Minecraft 1.7.10 mod that adds a plenty of tools and machines to your journey.

Project Rule Checker

C# Rule Validation System

C# Rule Engine .NET

Project Rule Checker is a flexible C# rule validation system designed for validating project structures and configurations. It provides a modular architecture for defining and executing validation rules across different project types.

Unity Chess Project

3D Chess Engine with AI

Unity C# AI 3D Graphics

Created in Unity 3D by Árnilsen Arthur as a small college project. Has animations, move generation, simple AI and Stockfish support. Supports PGN and FEN notations.

Key Achievements:

  • Implemented chess engine from scratch
  • Integrated Stockfish AI
  • 3D animations and visual effects
